name: Tier 3 Melee Fumbles (Levels 9-12)
description: Fumble effects for melee attacks at Tier 3 (Levels 9-12). Effects are more severe for experienced adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - You stumble but recover with no additional penalty.
Prone and Vulnerable - You fall prone and attacks against you have advantage until the start of your next turn.
Severe Muscle Tear - You badly injure yourself. Take 2d6 damage and have disadvantage on all attacks for 1 minute.
Weapon Damaged - Your weapon is badly damaged. -2 to attack and damage rolls until repaired.
Hit Yourself Hard - Your weapon rebounds and strikes you critically. Take double your weapon damage.
Stunning Embarrassment - Your catastrophic failure stuns you with humiliation. You are stunned until the end of your next turn.
Fatigued - The fumble exhausts you. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks for 1 minute.
Disarmed - Your weapon flies from your grasp, landing 20 feet away.
Hit Multiple Allies - Your wild swing threatens all allies within 5 feet. Roll attack against each ally's AC.
